token.点击下载YDKBs的刷固件工具及简单教程: Click here to download firmware reflash tool and simple how-to-do doc.
token.保存当前设置好按键的固件: Save firmware with your keymap setting
token.当前键盘刷机试的说明，及固件功能的说明: How to flash the firmware of this keyboard
token.注意：读取固件keymap会覆盖当前keymap。: Load keymap from your uploaded HEX.
token.上传hex或bin格式固件，再读取keymap，可以载入你先前在该固件中的按键配: Upload your HEX or BIN file to load your keymap.
token.如果有上传固件，则重新读取上传文件的按键配置。未上传则读取网页固件的默认按键配置: If a firmware was uploaded, it will reread its keymap. Or else it will read the default keymap of the firmware on the server.
token.按键透明，也可用鼠标中键点击按键设置: Set the key to be TRANS. You can click mouse middle key to quickly set it.
token.设置该按键在该层无效，也可用shift+鼠标中键点击设置: Set the key to be NO(disabled in this layer). You can click mouse middle key while holding shift to quickly set it.
token.火力模式按键(仅部分键盘支持此功能): Fire keys(Only a few of keyboards support this Function.)
token.火力模式 鼠标左键: fire key for mouse left button
token.瞬时开启层 | 层开关(连续点击两次时开关层): Layer Switch(momentary) and Toggle by two taps
token.修饰键，指ctrl shift alt(option) win(command): Send modifier(s) with or without a key
token.单击时是按键，长按及和其他键组合时是修饰键: Normal key when tapping, modifier(s) when holding
token.瞬时开启层的同时按下修饰键(目前仅支持左修饰键): Registers modifier(s) simulataneously with layer switching
token.单击是按键，长按及和其他键组合时是瞬时开启层: Turns on layer momentary while holding, but registers key on tap (press and release quickly)
token.瞬时开启层，如果连续点击多次（次数由固件定义）时开关层: Turns on layer momentary while holding and toggles it with several taps
token.启动一个快捷方式(仅支持windows，使用方法见帮助): Lauch a shortcut (only support windows, see Docs for more.)
token.可能是该键盘不支持的功能: Maybe not supported by this keyboard yet
token.切换显示键帽长度，配键帽的时候更直观方便: Display all keycaps' length of current layout.
token.ESC键，和Shift一起按时为~: Normally it is ESC. When shift is holded, it sends '~'.
token.4$键，和左alt一起按时为F4: Normally it is 4$. When left alt it holded, it send alt+f4.
token.RGB模式加，同时按住左Shift时为模式减: RGB Mode+. While pressing LShift, RGB Mode-.
token.部分键盘接蓝牙模块需占用LED灯的IO: Some keyboards use this io for bluetooth module
token.部分键盘使用RGB灯需占用LED灯的IO: Some keyboards use this io for RGB ws2812
